attributes.action: Ban immigration from ANY country with ties to extremism and terrorism
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We only have ourselves to blame for letting terrorists and terrorism to thrive in the U.K, if we were less politically correct and tolerant we would see the best solution to the irradication of terroism is to not allow those people from a country assosiated with extremism and terrorism to be allowed into this country FULL STOP.
Why on earth we take people from other countries and ways of life into consideration over the consideration of our lives, ways of life and safety is beyond me.
